parameters.name: Auto
parameters.description: Specify whether to automatically execute the lifecycle management rule.

parameters.name: EnableDeleteTag
parameters.description: Specify whether to enable lifecycle management for the artifact.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository.

parameters.name: RetentionTagCount
parameters.description: The number of images that you want to retain.

parameters.name: ScheduleTime
parameters.description: The execution cycle of the lifecycle management rule.

parameters.name: TagRegexp
parameters.description: The regular expression that is used to indicate which image tags are retained.
